snippet: Exceeding sentencing guidelines, a judge gave prison terms to a Catholic priest and a former teacher in a sexual abuse case that brought down a Philadelphia church official.
abstract: Pennsylvania judge exceeds sentencing guidelines and gives prison terms to Roman Catholic Rev Charles Engelhardt and former teacher Bernard Shero in sexual abuse case that rocked Philadelphia Archdiocese; Engelhardt is sentenced to 6 to 12 years in prison and Shero is sentenced to 8 to 16 years.
lead_paragraph: Exceeding sentencing guidelines, a judge gave prison terms to a Catholic priest and a former teacher in a sexual abuse case that brought down a Philadelphia church official.

headline.main: Pennsylvania: Priest and Ex-Teacher Get Prison for Abuse
